name: Wizards Arena
description:
Wizard Arena

We completed this tiny little game as an educational project during the vacations.

I really enjoyed introducing my 9 year old daughter and 12 year old son to creating a game together.

The result looks fantastic and I hope we will continue this journey together in the years to come ;-)

Controls:

  • Left-Mouse - Move to position
  • Space - Shoot
  • E - Ice
  • R - Earth
  • F - Lightning
  • T - Fire
